subject: [Wordfence Alert] Problems found on mets.edu.au
preview: This email was sent from your website "METS Training Services" by the Wordfence plugin. Wordfence found the following new issues on "METS Training Services" (2 existing issues were also found again).

full_threads.body:
This email was sent from your website "METS Training Services" by the Wordfence plugin.

Wordfence found the following new issues on "METS Training Services" (2 existing issues were also found again).

Alert generated at Friday 5th of December 2025 at 12:14:54 AM


See the details of these scan results on your site at: https://mets.edu.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=WordfenceScan

Critical Problems:

* The Plugin "JetEngine" needs an upgrade (3.7.3 -> 3.8.0).

Update includes security-related fixes.
Vulnerability Severity: 6.4/10.0 (Medium) Vulnerability Information
/#developers

Medium Severity Problems:

* The Plugin "Rank Math SEO" needs an upgrade (1.0.259 -> 1.0.259.1).

https://wordpress.org/plugins/seo-by-rank-math/#developers

* The Plugin "JetElements For Elementor" needs an upgrade (2.7.9.1 -> 2.7.12.1).

/#developers

* The Plugin "JetSearch" needs an upgrade (3.5.12 -> 3.5.16).

/#developers

* The Plugin "JetSmartFilters" needs an upgrade (3.6.9 -> 3.7.1).

/#developers

* The Plugin "JetTabs For Elementor" needs an upgrade (2.2.10 -> 2.2.12).

/#developers

* The Plugin "Elementor Pro" needs an upgrade (3.33.1 -> 3.33.2).

https://elementor.com/pro/changelog/#developers

Low Severity Problems:

* Old WordPress core file not removed during update: wp-includes/SimplePie/src/Core.php

2 existing issues were found again and are not shown.
